Mustafa Define all the configurable values of the package

static java.lang.String logBundle

static java.lang.Boolean matchOnlyExactLength
          Define if spell check considers only other words of the same length (Otherwise, we will use words of length +1 and -1)
static java.lang.Integer resultSize
          the number of results needed
static java.lang.Boolean useRuleFL
          Flag to apply RULE-FL (First Letter) RULE-FL: you don't misspell a word by typing the first letter wrong
static java.lang.Boolean useRuleWS
          Flag to apply RULE-WS (Word Sizes) RULE-WS: the difference in length with the word you are looking for is never more than 1

matchOnlyExactLength

public static final java.lang.Boolean matchOnlyExactLength
Define if spell check considers only other words of the same length (Otherwise, we will use words of length +1 and -1)

useRuleWS

public static final java.lang.Boolean useRuleWS
Flag to apply RULE-WS (Word Sizes) RULE-WS: the difference in length with the word you are looking for is never more than 1

useRuleFL

public static final java.lang.Boolean useRuleFL
Flag to apply RULE-FL (First Letter) RULE-FL: you don't misspell a word by typing the first letter wrong
